analysis.description:

	- ! _player.send(_playerBalance) (/unique_chucks/14/0x2dc8e886762ee490ec01269e48bf29075f59c0d4.sol#402-403)

Parameter '_newOwner' of EthBet._transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0x2dc8e886762ee490ec01269e48bf29075f59c0d4.sol#85-86) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_recipient' of EthBet.destroyAndSend (/unique_chucks/14/0x2dc8e886762ee490ec01269e48bf29075f59c0d4.sol#118-120) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_houseEdgeMin' of EthBet.editBetData (/unique_chucks/14/0x2dc8e886762ee490ec01269e48bf29075f59c0d4.sol#145-147) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_refererBonusPercent' of EthBet.editBetData (/unique_chucks/14/0x2dc8e886762ee490ec01269e48bf29075f59c0d4.sol#147-148) is not in mixedCase

Parameter '_maxBet' of EthBet.editBetData (/unique_chucks/14/0x2dc8e886762ee490ec01269e48bf29075f59c0d4.sol#149) is not in mixedCase
EthBet.BET_EXPIRATION_BLOCKS (/unique_chucks/14/0x2dc8e886762ee490ec01269e48bf29075f59c0d4.sol#34-36) is never used in EthBet
